definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: turn aside (Aram. [[סְטָא]], st.o0 id.; [[שְׂטָא]] stray; Eth. 3at’aya: III. be seduced, etc.; cf Dr:JPhil. xi (1882), 205);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[שָׂטִית]] Nu 5:19, Nu 5:20; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּשְׂטֶה]] v:Nu 5:12, v:Nu 5:29, juss. 3 ms. [[יֵשְׂטְ]] Pr 7:25; Imv. ms. [[שְׂטֵה]] Pr 4:15;—turn aside, of unfaithful wife Nu 5:12 (abs.), + [[תַּחַת אִישׁ]], i.e. while married, v:Nu 5:19 (+ [[טֻמְאָה]] adv. acc.), v:Nu 5:20, v:Nu 5:29 (all P); of youth, fr. ([[מֵעַל]]) way of evil woman Pr 4:15, toward ([[אֶל]]) her ways Pr 7:25.
